chapter.title: Exercise: Using a connector to send an email

section.title: Goal
section.para: The goal of this exercise is to demonstrate an interaction between Bonita BPM and an external system with the use of a connector. In this context, we will notify the leave request initiator about his request status with an email connector.

warning.para: Depending on your network configuration, your firewall or the security settings of your email server you may not be able to send an email from Bonita BPM.
In order to get rid of those technical constraints, we will use a program that simulates an email server (FakeSMTP).

para.emphasis: Add an email connector on the "Notify request approved" task.

listitem.para: Select the task, navigate to the "Execution / Connectors in" tab and click on "Add...".
Select the "Email (SMTP)" connector.
Name it "sendRequestApprovedEmail" and click on "Next".
